observation: Grow-in-Trade Inc. : No. 1 Cryptocurrency Trading Broker  Home About FAQs Contact Register Login The Power CRYPTOCURRENCY Get 150% Return on Your Investment in Only 5 Days SEE OUR PLANS Invest Your Up To 50% daily returns. Your Investment is Back in your Wallet 10 Times Faster INVEST NOW Welcome to Grow In trade Grow-in-Trade Inc. Is a digital investment company that is focused on trading and hedging top cap digital assets like Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin & Ripple. Start Now Grow-in-Trade - Binary Options & Bitcoin Mining The Easy & Secure Way Discover the power of earning in an increasing cryptocurrency ecosystem. About Grow-in-Trade Inc. Grow-in-Trade Inc. is a leading investment provider to financial market professionals. Our technical strategies cover Bitcoin, equity, commodities and fixed-income markets. Our market depth and knowledge are attributed to our acquired experience on trading floors of many banking institutions. Grow-in-Trade Inc. is duely registered with the American Trading Council, with registration number 229-602-2657. We are run by a team of trading experts who generate profits by buying and selling currencies, stocks, options and commodities on the foreign exchange market. We employ a variety of trading techniques to achieve the set goals for the client. view certificate Three Easy Steps to Start Earning HOW IT WORKS. Create an Account Creating an account is a free and painless process. Complete the registration form and get one step closer to earning. Create New Deposit Continue to make deposits on a range of plans available on your account - as provided by the platform. Start Earning Start earning with a return on investment by the percentage of the plans you made investments on. You also earn referral bonuses and commissions. Don't wait, start right now... Open an account Why Choose Us? Fully Secured Environment Using state-of-the art servers, we have guarded our servers with high-end SSL technology and the latest DDoS Guard to protect against attacks. Seamless Experience Earning has never been this easy. Whether you are making payments or making payouts or you are simply checking up on your investments, navigating the platform is seamless and easy. Experienced Support With trained and experienced support staffs, all your queries are just one click away from getting answered. Our support team provides 24/7 support and assistance to customers. Select an investment package and join thousands of investors already on the platform to start earning. Investment Plans 24 Hours Bronze Plan Interest: 50% Min: $100 Invest Now 3 Days Silver Plan Gold Plan Long-Term Diamond Plan Platform Statistics Live statistics on the platform including withdrawals and deposits. 11121 Members 1509 Visitors Online $ 31,162,381 Total Deposits $ 25,369,435 Total Withdrawals Latest james122 $ 800.00 mrbkhan786@gmail.com mafeke kadiri22 autoworldgh1 $ 50.00 azeez098 john008 aarjun lovechild blatter Roadmap The use of cryptocurrencies has become more widespread, The origin platform idea. Development of the concept and business plan. 2014 Grow-in-Trade Inc. is founded! 2015 Opening of our first facility in Iceland 2016 We launch our first Bitcoin awareness campaign Our customer base reaches 100.000 2017 Our Jamie Dimon billboard goes famous We sent a Bitcoin to space 2018 CNN's "Quest Means Business" visits us in Iceland We reach the milestone of 2.000.000 customers! 2019 Our first facility in Sweden starts running Our staged protest “Bankers Against Bitcoin” goes viral We win “Mining Initiative of the Year Award 2018” with our Radiant Technology 2020 Anderson Cooper visits Enigma, Grow-in-Trade Inc. featured in "60 Minutes" 2021 Grow-in-Trade Inc. featured in "Business Daily" Frequently Asked Questions Questions and Answers (Q&A), are listed questions and answers, all supposed to be commonly asked in some context General Trading Withdrawal What is Grow-in-Trade? Grow-in-Trade is a trading platform that makes it easy for you to start your journey as a investor. Our graphical tools and convenient technical analysis indicators help you make trading decisions. How Much Money Can I Make? Your success depends on your skills and patience, your chosen trading strategy, and the amount you are able to invest. We recommend watching our training videos first, so you can make more informed transactions. Beginning traders can try out their skills and practice on the practice account. What Is The Best Time To Choose For Trading? The best trading time depends on your trading strategy and a few other factors. We recommend that you pay attention to the market schedules, since the overlap of the American and European trading sessions makes prices more dynamic in currency pairs such as EUR/USD. You should also follow market news that might affect the movement of your chosen asset. It's better not to trade when prices are highly dynamic for inexperienced traders who don't follow the news and don't understand why the price is fluctuating. What Are The Purchase Time And Expiration Time? The purchase time is the white dotted line. After this time, you can't buy an option for the selected expiration time. The expiration time is shown by the solid red line. When the transaction crosses this line, it closes automatically and you take either a profit or a loss for the result. You can choose any available expiration time. There is usually a range available from one-and-a-half seconds up to one month. What Is The Minimum Amount Of An Investment Plan? We want trading to be available to everyone, so the minimum transaction amount on our platform is $100, depending on the selected account currency. There is no maximum deposit amount. Is There A Commission On Inactive Accounts? If you don't perform any operations on the platform for 90 days and there is some amount of money remaining on your account, we deduct a $10 fee for servicing the inactive account, but not more than the total of your trading balance. For example, if there's 0.4 USD on your account, not more than 0.4 USD can be charged. How Do I Withdraw Funds? To withdraw your money, go to Withdraw Funds. You will see a list of large icons representing available methods of withdrawal. Choose a method, enter the amount and other information, and click "Withdraw Funds". Your request will be handled within 30 minutes and you will receive your earnings. How Long Does It Take To Withdraw Funds? We aim to process all withdrawal requests within 30 minutes. Please keep in mind that the payment service provider may require more time to complete the process depending on the payment method. Do I Need To Provide Any Documents To Make A Withdrawal? Yes. You need to verify your identity in order to withdraw funds. Account verification is necessary in order to prevent fraudulent financial transactions on the account. About Bitcoin Minimum purchase is 100 Coins tokens. Get a bonus from 5% to 25% on every token purchase With us its a very sure increase on returns with our AI programs that work with our investment structure we help take you to your dream home, location or vacation. With a push of the button you too can be a self employed Techpreneur. All Countries Supported 1200 Bitcoin ATMs 2000 Producers Ready Leave a Message If You have any questions? we're happy to help Send Message 5895 W. Olympic Blvd. Los Angeles, CA 90036 +1 (669) 732-8241 support@growintrade.com Grow-in-Trade Inc. stands firmly in support of financial freedom and the liberty that Bitcoin provides globally for anyone. thought: The text extracted mentions unusually high returns on investments, such as "150% Return on Your Investment in Only 5 Days" and "Up to 50% daily returns." This is a classic sign of a scam, as it promises returns that are not generally possible in legitimate investments. Additionally, the site claims to have a registration number with the "American Trading Council," which may not be a legitimate entity. It's important to verify the existence of this company and the legitimacy of the claims made on the website.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain was recently created and uses a privacy service to hide the registrant's details. This is common for both legitimate and scam websites, but combined with the unrealistic investment returns promised on the site, it raises a red flag. Additionally, the website claims to be registered with a possibly non-existent entity, which I should verify.

thought: The GetSearchResult tool seems to be experiencing errors with the current inputs, so I can't verify the existence of the "American Trading Council" directly through search results. However, based on the observed characteristics of the website and the WHOIS information, I can still make an informed decision regarding the legitimacy of the website. Based on the unusually high returns promised, the recent creation of the domain, and the use of privacy services to hide registrant details, I am inclined to classify the website as a scam. However, I will perform one more check using the ExtractHyperlink tool to analyze the links on the page and see if any further suspicious elements are present.

The hyperlinks extracted are all pointing to a subdomain of the main website, which is not necessarily suspicious by itself. These links are typical for registration and login functions. However, the lack of external links or affiliations with known and reputable financial institutions, combined with the other red flags observed, reinforces the suspicion that this website might not be genuine. I now know the final answer based on the analysis of the URL content, the claims made on the website, the WHOIS information, and the hyperlinks present on the site. Based on the evidence collected, the URL https://growintrade.com/ appears to be a scam website.

observation.reason: The website promises unusually high returns which are generally not possible such as '150% Return on Your Investment in Only 5 Days' and 'Up to 50% daily returns.' The WHOIS information indicates that the domain was recently created and uses a privacy service to hide registrant details. Additionally there is a lack of verifiable information about the 'American Trading Council' they claim to be registered with and the hyperlinks on the site do not provide any credible affiliations.
